textAfterTable: Detailed description   Download .zip .tar.gz   Install with Composer   This class can be used to manage hosting accounts controlled by the DirectAdmin Web panel. It connects to a DirectAdmin panel Web server and can send commands to perform several types of account management actions. Currently it can: - Create and modify accounts - Manage account e-mail addresses - Create databases - Take backups - Retrieve the list of available backups - Retrieve account usage statistics of disk space, bandwidth, FTP and databases
